name: To Kill a Mockingbird
Description: A novel by Harper Lee, set in the American South, dealing with themes of race and justice.
A dystopian novel by George Orwell about a totalitarian regime that uses surveillance to control citizens.

name: Pride and Prejudice
Description: A romantic novel by Jane Austen, focusing on themes of love, reputation, and social class.

name: The Great Gatsby
Description: A novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald, set in the Jazz Age, exploring themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream.

name: Moby Dick
Description: A novel by Herman Melville, narrating the adventures of Ishmael as he joins a whaling expedition.
